name: Cylance Inc.
tagline: Prevent Cyber Attacks with Artificial Intelligence
description:
Cylance is a cybersecurity products and services company focusing on stopping tomorrow's attacks today. 
Cylance was created to solve the malware problem once and for all. 
CylancePROTECT® is the world's first next-generation antivirus built on artificial intelligence and machine learning. Named the SC Magazine Award winner for "Best Emerging Technology" in 2015, CylancePROTECT offers exponentially improved prevention capabilities when compared to other endpoint security solutions.
